importantArticles.headline: Shares of  SoundHound AI (NASDAQ: SOUN) fell 25% in March 2025, according to data from S&P Global Market Intelligence.  The maker of artificial intelligence (AI) tools for computer interpretation of voice commands didn't have an earnings release last month.  The company's only business-related press release featured another collaboration with AI giant Nvidia, which tends to drive SoundHound AI's stock higher.
importantArticles.title: Why SoundHound AI Stock Plunged 25% Lower in March

importantArticles.headline: Shares of SoundHound AI (NASDAQ: SOUN) are plunging on Friday.  The voice artificial intelligence (AI) technology company's stock lost 14.5% as of 1:50 p.m. ET and was down as much as 18.7% earlier in the day.  The steep decline comes as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite both lost nearly 5%.
importantArticles.title: Why SoundHound AI Stock Is Plummeting Today

importantArticles.headline: Shares of  SoundHound AI (NASDAQ: SOUN) fell 25% in March 2025, according to data from S&P Global Market Intelligence.  The maker of artificial intelligence (AI) tools for computer interpretation of voice commands didn't have an earnings release last month.  The company's only business-related press release featured another collaboration with AI giant Nvidia, which tends to drive SoundHound AI's stock higher.
importantArticles.title: Why SoundHound AI Stock Plunged 25% Lower in March

importantArticles.headline: At one point in late December, shares were up over 1,000% for the year, but then it sold off as investors took gains.  Nvidia owned about 1.73 million shares of SoundHound AI, which would have been valued at nearly $42 million at its peak.
importantArticles.title: Down 65%, Should You Buy the Dip on SoundHound AI Stock?
